sentences.en: " What's to be done?'she thought aloud.
sentences.cn: 她自言自语道 “ 怎么办 呢 ?”

sentences.en: " You think too much, old man, " he said aloud.
sentences.cn: “ 你想得太多了, 老家伙, " 他说出声来.

sentences.en: Better not say too much aloud.
sentences.cn: 最好不要大声说太多话。

sentences.en: He really must be careful about thinking aloud. Who knew what he might say?
sentences.cn: 他的确该注意自己说话不经思索的问题。谁知道他会说些什么？

sentences.en: I'll read the text aloud first.
Police, weary and increasingly sour in mood, wonder aloud why the situation has been allowed to deteriorate.
sentences.cn: 警察们疲惫不堪，心情也越来越糟糕，他们不禁满腹狐疑地问：为什么听凭情况不断地恶化下去？

sentences.en: Prudently, Joanna spoke none of this aloud.
sentences.cn: 出于慎重，乔安娜说这些话时一直压低声音。

sentences.en: Prue entered the passage in her notebook, then read it aloud again.
sentences.cn: 普吕把那一段写在她的笔记本上，然后又大声念了一遍。

sentences.en: She broke down and sobbed aloud.
sentences.cn: 她情不自禁地大声抽泣起来.

sentences.en: She could scarcely stop herself from crying aloud.
She couldn't hold back her tears any longer and wept aloud.
sentences.cn: 她再也忍不住了,大声哭泣起来.

sentences.en: The passage is too difficult and doesn't lend itself to reading aloud.
sentences.cn: 这段文字太艰深,不易上口.

sentences.en: The teacher listened to the children reading aloud .
The teacher listened to the children reading aloud.
When we were children, our father read aloud to us.
sentences.cn: 当我们是孩子时，我们的父亲大声地朗读给我们听。

trans.tran_en: if you read, laugh, say something etc aloud, you read etc so that people can hear you
